item.content:encoded:
Google's AI domains are thriving.
Month-over-month traffic growth in May:
#1da1f2; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600; padding: 2px 6px; background: rgba(29, 161, 242, 0.1); border-radius: 12px;">@GoogleDeepMind: 4,258,300 → 11,189,832 (+162.78%)

item.title:
Matt Diggity: I spent 6 months testing AI SEO tactics for clients.
One saw 2,300% AI traffic ...
item.description:
I spent 6 months testing AI SEO tactics for clients.
One saw 2,300% AI traffic growth and now appears in 90+ AI overviews (vs zero before).
Here's the exact 4-step framework we used:
1. Finding AI Opportunities:
• Use Surfer AI Tracker/Ahrefs Brand Radar to see how often AI platforms mention your brand vs. your competitors • Plug in your brand and theirs, then filter for AI keywords they’re winning that you’re not • Those are the exact topics you need to target and steal
item.content:encoded:
I spent 6 months testing AI SEO tactics for clients.
One saw 2,300% AI traffic growth and now appears in 90+ AI overviews (vs zero before).
Here's the exact 4-step framework we used:
1. Finding AI Opportunities:
• Use Surfer AI Tracker/Ahrefs Brand Radar to see how often AI platforms mention your brand vs. your competitors
• Plug in your brand and theirs, then filter for AI keywords they’re winning that you’re not
• Those are the exact topics you need to target and steal
Matt Diggity
@mattdiggityseo

item.title:
Chris Hoffmann: We acquired a $27M, 4th generation plumbing & HVAC service company.
However, fo...
item.description:
We acquired a $27M, 4th generation plumbing & HVAC service company.
However, for my first 7 years as CEO, I held this belief:
Organic growth > Growth via acquisition.
Between 2016 and 2022, we scaled Hoffmann Brothers from $9M → $80M organically.
We focused on:
✅ Building a proven operations playbook ✅ Driving consistent results with that playbook ✅ Developing leadership talent deep enough to scale or integrate
That foundation made us ready to acquire--not just eager to.
Too many entrepreneurs in home services get distracted by:
❌ “We’ve acquired X companies” ❌ “We’re in X markets” ❌ “We’re rolling up the industry”
What they really need?
To master the business they already own.
We resisted the acquisition temptation early. And that made us far more capable now.
item.content:encoded:
We acquired a $27M, 4th generation plumbing & HVAC service company.
However, for my first 7 years as CEO, I held this belief:
Organic growth > Growth via acquisition.
Between 2016 and 2022, we scaled Hoffmann Brothers from $9M → $80M organically.
We focused on:
✅ Building a proven operations playbook
✅ Driving consistent results with that playbook
✅ Developing leadership talent deep enough to scale or integrate
That foundation made us ready to acquire--not just eager to.
Too many entrepreneurs in home services get distracted by:
❌ “We’ve acquired X companies”
❌ “We’re in X markets”
❌ “We’re rolling up the industry”
What they really need?
To master the business they already own.
We resisted the acquisition temptation early.
And that made us far more capable now.
Chris Hoffmann
@STLChrisH

item.title: Cloudflare Radar: #Internet traffic in #Iran has been recovering since Saturday, though recovery a...
item.description: #Internet traffic in #Iran has been recovering since Saturday, though recovery appears to be primarily on fixed infrastructure providers. Fixed providers have seen strong traffic growth, while major mobile providers @www_mci_ir and @irancell remain largely offline. https://t.co/mDHNBXUMAs

item.title:
War of Nova: Data talks: @warofnova, our first flagship title, crushed it with Season 1.
✅ C...
item.description:
Data talks: @warofnova, our first flagship title, crushed it with Season 1.
✅ Consistent organic growth and retention. ✅ $2M in-app revenue / 3,100+ paying users. ✅ Average session length 30+ minutes. ✅ Web2 ARPDAU $52 / Web3 ARPDAU $102. ✅ Real-time guild coordination and strategy.
Next up, $RCADE TGE and @SkyborneLegacy Phoenix Flight launch. The best part is that we're just getting started.
